bio: I\'m a full stack Java developer with 10+ years of experience in software development. I have a Master of Science in Computer Science from Maharishi International University, a Master of Science in Computer Science and Networking from the University of Pisa, and a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science and a Bachelor of Arts in Business Administration and Information Systems from Addis Ababa University. I have experience in Java, Python, C++, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, Spring, React, Angular, Django, Restjs, Oracle, MySQL, AWS, and GCP. I have worked as a Software Developer at the Ethiopian Revenues and Customs Authority, the Development Bank of Ethiopia, and NTT DATA, and as a Software Engineer at Walmart Global Tech. I am currently seeking a full-time position as a Software Engineer. I am a hard worker, a team player, and a quick learner. I am passionate about software development and I am always looking to learn new technologies and improve my skills.
name: TESFAMICHAEL ADUGNA
title: FULL STACK JAVA DEVELOPER

responsibilities: Conducted unit load testing and implemented performance optimizations.
Automated deployment pipeline for microservices using CI/CD.
Fixed code smells and improved test coverage.
Contributed to backend software development, integration, documentation, testing, and deployment.
Led development of 2 major projects for leading telecommunications companies.
Developed clean and efficient code based on requirements and specifications.
Delivered complex projects on time and according to specifications.
Upgraded existing software and integrated software components.
